data.title: Member School Listings
meta_keywords: Missouri school accreditation process member listings
data.meta_description: Member listings for the Missouri Nonpublic School Accrediting Association.
data.text:
The Missouri Nonpublic School Accrediting Association currently accredits 265 schools across the state of Missouri

Our organization accredits early childhood, elementary, and high schools.

Schools are listed below according to their location (city).

Click on the alphabetical links to search for schools by their location.
